mapper.insert: insert into imageShare (userID, image, category, shootTime, cameraModel, cameraParam, description, releaseTime, loveNumber) values (#{userID}, #{image}, #{category}, #{shootTime}, #{cameraModel}, #{cameraParam}, #{description}, #{releaseTime}, #{loveNumber})
insert into invitation (userID, content, releaseTime, loveNumber) values (#{userID}, #{content}, #{releaseTime}, #{loveNumber})
insert into review (category, obejctID, reviewerID, comment, reviewTime) values (#{category}, #{obejctId}, #{reviewerId}, #{comment}, #{reviewTime})
